successes.title: Mars Attacks - The Miniatures Game
successes.description: Take on the Martian Menace in the fight for Earth with this brand new tabletop miniatures game from the creators of DreadBall!

Pledges.description: THANK YOU! This reward level is perfect if you just want to pledge for add-ons and not the whole game. Want a squad of US Soldiers? Perhaps you’re only looking for scenery? Maybe you just want a cool T-shirt? Then this is the pledge level for you! Includes free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.
OPERATION: EARTH
THANK YOU FOR BACKING! We will send you a digital copy of the rulebook.
CIVILIAN RESISTANCE – Card Collectors

A set of exclusive Topps Trading Cards with never-before-seen unique art. These cards will never be sold outside of this Kickstarter.  Includes free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.
Martian Memory Stick - An 8GB USB Stick with a Martian Head design, pre-loaded with exclusive digital content. Includes free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.

Martian DreadBall Team - 8 Players including Guards, Jacks and Strikers, plus rules for using the team in DreadBall - The Futuristic Sports Game. Includes free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.
SUBURBAN NIGHTMARE

One-click scenery only pledge! Choose any *2* Standard Scenery Packs of your choice from those available – please see main page for details - PLUS *2* sets of Urban Battlefield Accessories! Sprue designs subject to change. Includes free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.
THE FRONT LINE
1 x Mars Attacks – The Miniatures Game. Includes free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.
EARLY BIRD - THE WILL OF MAN

1 x Mars Attacks – The Miniatures Game + $50 worth of Core Add-ons of your choice + applicable stretch goal rewards. Includes free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.
EARLY BIRD 2 - THE WILL OF MAN

1 x Mars Attacks – The Miniatures Game + $50 worth of Core Add-ons of your choice + applicable stretch goal rewards. Includes free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.
